The user launches their [[jōhyō]] at the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* The {{translation|"Treasured Tool"|宝具|Hōgu}} might come from the fact that a jōhyō was given to Matsuri, a user of this technique, by [[Gaara]] — a person who she greatly admires.

[[pl:Hissatsu Hōguryūsei]]
